gameDetails.name: 7 Wonders: Leaders â€“ Louis
gameDetails.description:
From Spielbox Magazine:

Louis Armstrong is an additional leader for 7 Wonders: Leaders. It is only playable with 7 Wonders: Leaders, but may also be integrated along with the leaders of 7 Wonders: Cities.

At the end of the game, Louis gives 7 victory points minus the number of military victory tokens you have won.
